src:
Tiram srušio Romu u nadoknadi, Belgijanci ukrotili „vukove“, uspešan i drugi škotski velikan
07 Nov 2019, 23:20 by Zile
Poznati su svi ishodi utakmica četvrtog kola Lige Evrope.
Posle Seltika uspešan je bio i drugi velikan iz Glazgova. Rendžers je pobedio Porto i stekao odlične šanse da zauzme jedno od prva dva mesta u G grupi. Junaci pobede „policajaca“ bili su Morelos i Dejvis, koji su postigli golove u 69. odnosno 73. minutu. U drugoj utakmici grupe Fejnord i Jang Bojs su podelili bodove na popularnom „tiganju“ u Roterdamu. Holanđani su poveli iz jedanaesterca, ali je Špilman izjednačio u nastavku.
Bugari su se proveli kao bosi po trnju u Kataloniji. Espanjol je i drugi put pobedio Ludogorec, ovog puta mnogo lakše. Gosti su od 35. minuta igrali sa devetoricom, pa na kraju mogu da budu zadovoljni sa „samo“ pola tuceta lopti u mreži. Dobra vest za „ludu šumu“ stigla je iz Budimpešte gde su Ferencvaroš i moskovski CSKa igrali bez golova, pa su oni ostali na drugom mestu.
Belgijski Gent je osvojio bodove u gradu automobila, nemačkom Volfsburgu. „Vukovi“ su potpuno van forme, pa su vezali treći uzastopni poraz u svim takmičenjima, a već sedam utakmica ne znaju za trijumf. I oni su srećni zbog ishoda druge utakmice u grupi, ukrajinska Oleksandrija nadokandila je dva gola prednosti Sent Etjena i sada te dve ekipe imaju po tri boda, dok je Volfsburg ostao na pet.
Roma je prepustilia prvo mesto u grupi J porazom u Menhengladbahu. Lider nemačke Bundeslige slavio je sa 2:1. Prvo je Facio postigao po gol na obe strane. Njegovim autogolom domaći su poveli, ali je isti fudbaler izjednačio. Odluka je pala u 95. minutu, a strelac je bio sve bolji Markus Tiram.
Na prvo mesto popela se ekipe turskog Bašakšehira, pobedivši austrijski Volfsberger sa 3:0 u gostima. Naš Nemanja Rnić je isključen u 70. minutu i tada je krenuo potop domaćina. Vića i Kriveli dva puta, doneli su trijumf gostima.
Sve je jasno u K grupi, dalje će Braga i Vulverhempton. Portugalci su bili sigurni protiv Bešiktaša, koji još nema ni bod, a istakao se Paulinjo, dvostruki strelac za portugalski tim. „Vukovi“ su imali mnogo muke sa slovačkim šampionom, Neveš je promašio penal na startu drugog poluvremena, da bi gol odluke postigao Himenez u drugom minutu sudijske nadoknade.
Grupa G:
Rendžers – Porto 2:0(0:0)Fejnord – Jang Bojs 1:1(1:0)
Grupa H:
Espanjol – Ludogorec 6:0(3:0)Ferencvaroš – CSKA 0:0
Grupa I:
Volfsburg – Gent 1:3(1:0)Oleksandrija – Sent Etjen 2:2(0:1)
Grupa J:
Menhengladbah – Roma 2:1(1:0)Volfsberger – Bašakšehir 0:3(0:0)
Grupa K:
Braga – Bešiktaš 3:1(2:1)Vulverhempton – Slovan 1:0(0:0)
Grupa L:
Mančester Junajted – Partizan 3:0(2:0)Astana – AZ Alkmar 0:5(0:1)

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Tiram overthrows Roma in compensation, Belgians tame "wolves", successful and other Scottish giant
07 Nov 2019, 22:20 by Zile
All the outcomes of the fourth round of the Europa League are known.
After Celtic, another Glasgow great was successful. The Rangers beat Porto and got a great chance to take one of the top two spots in the G Group. The heroes of the "cop" victory were Morelos and Davis, who scored goals in the 69th and 73rd minutes respectively. In the second game, the groups Feynord and Young Boys split points at a popular "pan" in Rotterdam. The Dutch took the lead from the penalty spot, but Spillman equalized below.
Bulgarians spent their time barefoot on the thorns in Catalonia. Spain beat Ludogorec for the second time, much easier this time. Guests have been playing with nine for 35 minutes, so they can be satisfied with “only” half a dozen balls in the net. The good news for the "crazy forest" came from Budapest where Ferencvaros and CSK Moscow played without goals, so they remained in second place.
The Belgian Gent won points in the city of the car, German Wolfsburg. The Wolves are completely out of shape, so they have tied for the third consecutive defeat in all competitions, and for seven games they do not know about the triumph. And they are happy about the outcome of the second game in the group, Ukrainian Oleksandriya made up two goals advantage of Saint-Etienne and now the two teams have three points each, while Wolfsburg remain at five.
Roma left first place in Group J by defeat in Munich. The leader of the German Bundesliga celebrated 2: 1. First Facio scored on both sides. The home team took his own goal, but the same football player equalized. The decision fell in the 95th minute, and Markus Tiram was the better scorer.
Turkey's Basaksehir came first, beating Austria's Wolfsberger 3-0 away. Our Nemanja Rnic was shut off in the 70th minute and then the hosts flooded. Vic and Krivli twice, brought triumph to the guests.
Everything is clear in the K group, Braga and Wolverhampton will go on. The Portuguese were safe against Besiktas, who did not even have a point, and Paulinjo, a double scorer for the Portuguese team, stood out. The Wolves had a lot of trouble with the Slovak champion, Neves missed a penalty at the start of the second half to score the goal of the decision by Jimenez in the second minute of the referee.
Group G:
Rangers - Porto 2: 0 (0: 0) Feynord - Young Boys 1: 1 (1: 0)
Group H:
Espanyol - Ludogorets 6: 0 (3: 0) Ferencvaros - CSKA 0: 0
Group I:
Wolfsburg - Gent 1: 3 (1: 0) Olexandria - Saint-Etienne 2: 2 (0: 1)
Group J:
Mönchengladbach - Roma 2: 1 (1: 0) Wolfsberger - Basaksehir 0: 3 (0: 0)
Group K:
Braga - Besiktas 3: 1 (2: 1) Wolverhampton - Slovan 1: 0 (0: 0)
Group L:
Manchester United - Partizan 3: 0 (2: 0) Astana - AZ Alkmaar 0: 5 (0: 1)
